devdoc.details: This contract is the canonical on-chain source of truth for basket composition.      It stores basket metadata including:      - Asset composition (list of asset identifiers)      - Weights (in basis points, must sum to 10000)      - Creator address (fund creator role)      - Activation state       IMPORTANT: This contract is pure metadata storage.      No pricing logic should exist here - that belongs in BasketOracle.       The basketId is a unique identifier assigned sequentially to each basket.      Asset identifiers are strings (e.g., "AAPL", "GOLD", "NVDA") that are used      by the BasketOracle to look up prices.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

BasketCreated(uint256,address,uint256).details: Full basket details can be queried via getBasket(basketId)

createBasket(string[],uint256[],string,s.details: Only callable by anyone (fund creator role).      Weights must sum to 10000 basis points (100%).      Each weight must be non-zero.

params.name: Human-readable name for the basket
params.weights: Array of weights in basis points

returns.basketId: The unique ID assigned to the new basket

returns.creator: The creator address
returns.name: Basket name
returns.weights: Array of weights in basis points
Array of weights in basis points

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: BasketRegistry

ArrayLengthMismatch().notice: Thrown when assets and weights arrays have different lengths

EmptyAssetsArray().notice: Thrown when assets array is empty

InvalidWeightsSum().notice: Thrown when weights don't sum to 10000 basis points

NotBasketCreator().notice: Thrown when caller is not the basket creator

ZeroWeight().notice: Thrown when a weight is zero

BasketActiveStateChanged(uint256,bool).notice: Emitted when a basket's active state changes

BasketCreated(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a new basket is created

basketCount().notice: Counter for generating unique basket IDs

createBasket(string[],uint256[],string,s.notice: Create a new basket with specified assets and weights

creatorBaskets(address,uint256).notice: Mapping from basket creator to list of their basket IDs

deactivateBasket(uint256).notice: Deactivate a basket (only creator or owner)

getBasket(uint256).notice: Get complete basket data by ID

getBasketAssetCount(uint256).notice: Get the number of assets in a basket

getBasketComposition(uint256).notice: Get basket composition (assets and weights only)

getBasketsByCreator(address).notice: Get all basket IDs created by a specific address

isBasketActive(uint256).notice: Check if a basket is active

reactivateBasket(uint256).notice: Reactivate a basket (only creator or owner)
